guide: Throw Goblin Eggs that you get from killing Goblins
or opening chests in the Crystal Hollows
in the Dwarven Mines and kill what spawns from it.
Some HOTM perks, such as Sky Mall, Efficient Miner,
Luck of the Cave, Mining Speed and Anomalous Desires
may be helpful for this.
You will gain progress on this by going for
the Iron Collector goal. Doing Mining Commissions
will be a good help with this.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchantment
guide: Kill mobs with a weapon that you have
Scavenger 3+ applied to.
Mine normal or Pure Ores in the Dwarven Mines.
You will gain passive progress in this if you
manual the Gold Collector Goal.
Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Mine Pure Iron in the Dwarven Mines
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe.
You might want to use as many minions
as you have access to for this.
Remember to put a compactor in the minions
when you plan on leaving for a while.
Don't forget to fuel the minions,
give them storages and collect them in time.
You will most likely get this from leveling up
skills for the Skill Average goal.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on skyerzz's, nightlibra's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
You can unlock 17/17 Farming Collections,
6/11 Combat Collections, 6/6 Foraging Collections,
14/22 Mining Collections for a total of 43 collections.
You will also get some Fishing Collections.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub or
enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (50 Levels).
This requires Catacombs Level 1 and
a completion of the previous floor.
You may need help from party finder
or friends for this.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
This unlocks at 5k Diamond Collection. Use Pure Ores
in the Dwarven Mines for this. Craft it with
1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (costs 40 Jungle Leaves,
requires Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock it in /trades.)
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Use /warp trapper
to get back to Trevor whenever you want.
You will need a bow for this.
Fish with an Enchanted Chum Rod in the Rain
in the Park. Use the best bait you can.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces including equipment)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste and Starlight Armor from Rosetta
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End or Mushroom Armor
during the night.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Lumberjack's or Moil
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Do commissions and events in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You might want to use the Royal Reforge on your
equipment to gain more powder from events.
§fNo eggs:
Dolphin, Bee, Grandma Wolf, Bingo, Rock, Owl,
Enderman, Tarantula and Oringo pets
§fEggs needed:
Jerry, Rabbit, Pig, Chicken, Bat, Silverfish
To get the Enchanted Eggs needed, kill Chickens
in The Barn till you get the Chicken Head recipe.
Once you get your first Enchanted Egg, put it into
one Chicken Minion to generate more of those over time.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Dark/Fish Bait.
Make sure to have Looting 3+ applied to your
weapon and rod. You might want to use the Squid Head too.

note: Consume a Mushed Glowy Tonic Potion
guide: Save all the Chum you gather from the other
fishing goals and fill 8 Chum Buckets with it.
In total you will need 90 Glowing Mushrooms
and 16k coins to buy this from Moby on the Desert Island.
You will get some progress in this by going for
the Ink Sac Collector, Is This Safe? and
Friend Of The Seas goal.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Dark/Fish Bait.
Make sure to have Looting 3+ applied to your
weapon and rod.
You can also use fishing minions to help with this.
Remember to give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and collect in time.
